DOC.brief_summary: JY09ï¼Œis recombinant glucagon-like peptide-1 ( GLP-1 ) receptor agonist , construct Exendin-4 human Immunoglobulin G2 ( IgG2 ) Fc fragment.Preclinical study show JY09 exhibit expect GLP-1-mediated pharmacological effect insulin secretion , glucose cover islet cell recovering , well good tolerance safety.JY09 approve China food drug administration ( CFDA ) enter clinical research stage ( Grant number 2016L04254 ) .This study design assess safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics potential immunogenicity JY09 healthy Chinese volunteer .
